title: Business Ideas Generator
description: A website that generates business ideas based on the person's interests, their skills and the market they want to work in.

title: YouTube Insights
description: A Chrome extension that extracts insights from YouTube videos for anyone doing market research or wants to get the points from a video.

title: Pseudocode validator
description: A website that was designed to build pseudocode visually (drag and drop style) before starting to code.

title: Anvil Templates
description: A website designed fully in Anvil that provides premade templates for the Anvil platform.

title: Language Clips
description: A website designed to help people learn languages through native speakers posting audio clips and learners requesting audio clips.
